thread.title: Peace talks underway to prevent a tube strike which threatens disruption for thousands of commuters
thread.title_full: Peace talks underway to prevent a tube strike which threatens disruption for thousands of commuters | London - ITV News

author: Simon Harris
title: Peace talks underway to prevent a tube strike which threatens disruption for thousands of commuters
text:
Peace talks were underway today to try to prevent a tube strike which threatens disruption for hundreds of thousands of commuters.
Credit: PA Negotiators from London Underground and three unions are meeting at the Euston offices of the concilliation service ACAS.
Members of the RMT, Aslef and TSSA are due to walk out on Wednesday in a row over pay and shift patterns for the planned 24-hour 'Night Tube'.
Talks broke down yesterday when Aslef pulled out and the other unions refused to take part.
Last updated Thu 2 Jul 2015 Travel London
